channel.title: 华尔街日报

item.title: 驻韩美军高官表示，他对遏制朝鲜核武器的想法已经改变
item.description:
The top U.S. military official in South Korea said his thinking has changed on deterring North Korea’s nuclear weapons https://t.co/N6TAe63Mbz https://t.co/N6TAe63Mbz

item.title: 深夜节目主持人吉米-法伦（Jimmy Fallon）一直在等待谈论他的护肤程序。"从来没有人问过我，"他说。"我一直在求别人问我"
item.description:
Late-night host Jimmy Fallon has been waiting to talk about his skin care routine. “No one’s ever asked me,” he said. “I’ve been begging for someone to.” https://t.co/ikzTN423YE https://t.co/ikzTN423YE

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 12, 2024

item.title: 他们认为自己最平庸的想法都是绝妙的，忽略了自己正在挣扎的迹象，把纠正当成建议。
item.description:
They think their most banal ideas are brilliant, ignore signs that they’re struggling and treat corrections like suggestions.

Your co-worker is lousy—and doesn’t even know it. https://t.co/2rYoXguIKs https://t.co/2rYoXguIKs

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 12, 2024

item.title: 一位高端婴儿摄影师说，父母们为她的照片拍摄支付了高达 11,000 美元的费用，其中包括《权力的游戏》中王座的微型复制品等道具。
item.description:
A high-end baby photographer said parents have paid as much as $11,000 for her photo shoots, which include props like a miniature copy of the titular throne from “Game of Thrones" https://t.co/8HTxg9iDCs https://t.co/8HTxg9iDCs

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 12, 2024

item.title: 纽约州西部一个自称是汉堡包发源地的小镇正在酝酿一项计划：在空中放一个巨型汉堡来吸引游客它将 "成为我们的象征"。
item.description:
A plan is cooking in a Western New York town that claims to be the birthplace of the hamburger: Put a giant burger in the sky to attract tourists. It would “be a symbol of who we are.” https://t.co/hsknhEcumr https://t.co/hsknhEcumr

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 12, 2024

item.title: 为您的下一次鸡尾酒会增添一抹黑色礼服的优雅，用这些比以往更简单的食谱，让您的鸡尾酒会不再疯狂。

item.title: 没有照片，就没有账单。这是越来越多的司机为躲避高速公路收费而采取的办法，他们用篡改或遮挡车牌的方式躲避摄像头。
item.description:
No photo, no bill. That’s the approach more drivers are taking to dodge highway tolls, avoiding cameras with doctored or covered-up license plates. https://t.co/ECxXHxSbDC https://t.co/ECxXHxSbDC

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 12, 2024

item.title: 这款宾利对隐形财富并不感兴趣。它看起来就像 Bentayga 一直向往的超豪华 SUV。
item.description:
This Bentley isn’t interested in stealth wealth. It looks exactly like the over-the-top SUV that the Bentayga has always aspired to be. https://t.co/MUmgcbYTGg https://t.co/MUmgcbYTGg

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在担任总统时曾提出对 TikTok 实施禁令，但这一努力因法律挑战而受阻。但上周他在众议院周三投票前批评了一项新法案，这表明他的立场发生了转变。
item.description:
Donald Trump moved to implement a ban on TikTok when he was president, an effort that was derailed by legal challenges. But last week he criticized a new bill ahead of a House vote Wednesday, indicating his position had flipped. https://t.co/7Vwz26rZOA https://t.co/7Vwz26rZOA

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 12, 2024

item.title: 最近的一项研究发现，我们中的许多人至少有一个器官比其他器官衰老得更快
item.description:
A recent study found that many of us are walking around with at least one organ aging much more quickly than the others https://t.co/fYnb2q7xaf https://t.co/fYnb2q7xaf

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 12, 2024

item.title: 我们已经提前看到了 Z 世代管理的工作场所的模样。准备好迎接许多变化吧。

We’re getting an early glimpse at what Gen Z-run workplaces will look like. Prepare for a lot of changes. https://t.co/ACM9W7zZaH https://t.co/ACM9W7zZaH

item.title: 根据病毒式传播的 "意想不到的红色理论"，一抹令人惊讶的深红色是打造别致生活空间的秘诀。百万 TikTokers 会错了吗？
item.description:
According to the viral “Unexpected Red Theory,” a surprising dash of crimson is the secret to chic living spaces. Can a million TikTokers be wrong? https://t.co/VpWUItJkXZ https://t.co/VpWUItJkXZ

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 12, 2024

item.title: 在一些新型电动汽车中，12 伏蓄电池会反复意外损坏。这一问题令车主措手不及，并引发了网上投诉。这一问题还引发了至少两项监管调查。
item.description:
In some new electric-car models, the 12-volt batteries are dying repeatedly and unexpectedly. The issue has taken owners by surprise and led to complaints online. It also has prompted at least two regulatory probes. https://t.co/Wk6ccvtr5w https://t.co/Wk6ccvtr5w

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 前法拉利车手费利佩-马萨（Felipe Massa）声称，F1官员掩盖了被称为 "撞车门"（Crashgate）的操纵比赛丑闻，使他失去了冠军头衔。他还要求赔偿 8000 多万美元。
item.description:
Former Ferrari driver Felipe Massa alleges that the fallout of a race-fixing scandal known as Crashgate was covered up by F1 officials and cost him a title. He is also seeking more than $80 million in damages. https://t.co/EBUGkIUqAl https://t.co/EBUGkIUqAl

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 威尔士王妃为编辑全家福道歉。但什么时候可以篡改照片呢？妮可-阮（Nicole Nguyen）在此探讨美化与误导之间的界限。
item.description:
The Princess of Wales apologized for editing a family portrait. But when is it OK to manipulate your photos?

Here, Nicole Nguyen on the line between beautification and misinformation. https://t.co/kausEXYofy https://t.co/kausEXYofy

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 这张照片本应向世人保证，威尔士王妃凯瑟琳一切安好。结果适得其反。
item.description:
It was the photo that was supposed to reassure the world that all was well with Catherine, Princess of Wales. It backfired. https://t.co/m6I4fsrlbw https://t.co/m6I4fsrlbw

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 在一夜之间时钟提前之后，我们中的许多人都为晚上能有更多的光线而兴奋不已。但医生们却不这么认为。以下是如何应对时间变化的方法。
item.description:
Many of us are excited about having more light in the evenings after the clocks sprang forward overnight. Doctors aren’t. Here’s how to navigate the time change. https://t.co/TsIDsReibK https://t.co/TsIDsReibK

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 欧胡岛海岸的这一悠闲地带，是威基基和夏威夷岛上其他游客众多的角落的大众旅游市场的一剂良药。以下是游览计划。
item.description:
This laid-back strip of Oahu's coast offers an antidote to the mass-market tourism of Waikiki and other heavily visited corners of the Hawaiian island. Here's how to plan a visit. https://t.co/0iRKA5CYao https://t.co/0iRKA5CYao

item.title: 你的夹克或毛衣到腰带就结束了吗？如果没有巧妙地剪裁，你就错过了一个能让你看起来更高挑的窍门，这些时尚达人如是说。
item.description:

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：如果美国人看到他们的信贷成本增加，获得信贷的机会减少，或者信用卡奖励消失，那就怪拜登政府的新价格控制措施吧

item.title: 来自 @WSJopinion：我们是否在为我们的未来铺路，因为我们不重视农业而忽视其他经济活动，从而面临粮食短缺和价格上涨的风险？@HurstBlake 写道：这种担忧被夸大了
item.description:

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：阿根廷总统哈维尔害怕美元化吗？对于一个负债累累的国家来说，继续开动比索印刷机是权宜之计，@MaryAnastasiaOG 写道
item.description:

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）可能已经缩减了企业气候披露新规的范围，但财务主管们在准备遵守新规时仍面临诸多挑战和成本问题
item.description:
